articles.description: American skier Lindsey Vonn says she has "no regrets" after a crash in the women's downhill competition at the Winter Olympics resulted in a "complex tibia fracture".
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn: American skier has 'no regrets' after sustaining tibia fracture in crash at Winter Olympics

articles.description: Sam Darnold leading the Seattle Seahawks to Super Bowl glory could just be the greatest redemption story ever in the NFL. We take a closer look.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2026: Is Seattle Seahawks' Sam Darnold greatest NFL redemption story?

articles.description: Ukranian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych claims the IOC has banned his helmet featuring images of people killed in the war in his home country, in a decision that "breaks my heart".
articles.title: Vladyslav Heraskevych: Ukraine skeleton racer says IOC banned war victims helmet

articles.description: American great Serena Williams is eligible to return to competition on 22 February when she will have completed the reinstatement process.
articles.title: Serena Williams: American great eligible to return on 22 February

articles.description: Formula 1 design legend Adrian Newey says Aston Martin's new car is "one of the more extreme interpretations" of this year's new rules.
articles.title: Aston Martin: New F1 car 'one of the more extreme interpretations' of new rules

articles.description: Milan-Cortina 2026 organisers say they are "looking closely" at the issue of Olympic medals breaking after several athletes suffered issues with their prizes.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics broken medals: Milan-Cortina organisers look into matter

articles.description: Bangladesh ask Pakistan to end their planned boycott of their T20 World Cup match against India, opening the door for the fixture to be played.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Bangladesh request Pakistan play fixture against India

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and radio analysis as second-placed Middlesbrough visit Sheffield United in the Championship.
articles.title: Sheffield United v Middlesbrough LIVE: Boro looking to go top of Championship

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is set to return in Saudi Arabia, a change in Barcelona's boardroom might determine whether Marcus Rashford stays in Spain, Zinedene Zidane may be heading back to Real Madrid, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Ronaldo, Rashford, Ndiaye, Alvarez, Tonali, Luis Enrique, Klopp, Zidane

articles.description: Mia Brookes finishes fourth in the snowboard big air final - ending a frustrating day for Team GB that had promised so much more.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Team GB's Mia Brookes places fourth in snowboard big air final
